wordGroup: cease to be 不再是；停任
without cease 不停地，不断地

sentences.en: They voted to cease strike action immediately.
sentences.cn: 他们投票决定立即停止罢工。

sentences.en: Heavy fighting erupted there today after a two-day cease-fire.
sentences.cn: 激烈的战斗在两天的停火之后今天在那里爆发了。

sentences.en: You never cease to amaze me!
